document_data.caption: The [[halfling]] [[Rogue|thief]] Foxy.
document_data.name: Foxilon Cardluck
document_data.mainbody: '''Foxilon Cardluck''', better known as '''Foxy''', was a crew-member of the [[Halruaa|Halruaan]] [[caravel]] ''[[Realms Master]]'' in [[1370 DR]].{{Cite dragon/247/Rogues Gallery: Crew of the Realms Master|74-80}}
document_data.History:
Foxy was born in [[Luiren]] but soon left in search of adventures with some [[halfling]] companions. However, Foxy and his fellows were tricked by [[Joribel]] into becoming addicted to a narcotic substance known as [[cheeeese]]. So they became Joribel's pawnsâ€”stealing, raiding and even killing for a piece of cheeeese. However, when a bully took Foxy's cheeeese, Foxy briefly regained lucidity, managing to escape together with a halfling girl.

In their escape, they met [[Dwalimar Omen]] and [[Minder]]. Foxy explained his situation and Omen destroyed Joribel. Afterward the [[wizard]] trained Foxy in stealing magical items. When Omen launched the ''Realms Master'', Foxy became his first mate.
document_data.Personality: Foxy was a buoyant and charming individual. He was protective of his crew members and considered it his mission to keep their spirits up. Foxy was friendly and liked almost all people but was not naive. Sometimes he still felt a craving for cheeeese but resisted the temptation.
